Key: Huh...
(What was I doing?)
What's the matter, darling?
Huh?
Whoa. Miku, you surprised me.
Whaaat～? You're so strange, darling.
O-Oh, sorry. I was in a daze.
Darling, what's the matter?
R-Right, Miku... You're Miku, right?

Goodness. We finally have alone time.
Please be present～.
Sorry, sorry.

Okay, so I can proceed with what we just
discussed?

Wh-What we just discussed? Uh, what were
we talking about again?

Argh! My! You're such a mess, darling. We
were talking about going home together after
school. We can meet at your classroom, okay?
...Okay, let's do that. Then I'll see you later.
Okaaaaay! Wait for me, okay～?
O-Okay. Leave it to me.

I have to move classrooms, so I'm going to go
now, okay?
Okay. I'll see you later.
Here you go, darling.
Huh? What's up?
Give me a good-bye kiss.

Huh? Well, we're at school. Someone might
be watching.
Ugh, darling! You're such a meanie!

I feel like we should do that kind of stuff when
we get to know each other better.

Very well. I guess I'll have to wait until the
next time～.
Argh... Okay, I'll keep it in mind.

Hehehe. Promise～. Anyways, I'll be on my
way.

(Phew. That was a close one. I was almost
about to say good-bye before knowing what
I agreed to.)
My. It's so gross to do that in broad daylight.

Oh, so it's true, huh? That senior animal got
ahold of her.
What a turn off.
Whoa! Were you guys watching?

Ugh. So gross. I'm running so his perversions
won't rub off on me.
Miku-senpai got with HIM? I'm shocked.
What a turn off.
Crap, of all the people to see us...

(But I wonder if this is a good sign for what's
to come between us.)
Okay, class is finally over.

(I promised Miku that I'd go home with her,
but...)
(Seems like Miku's homeroom isn't done yet.)
Um, excuse me～.
Hm? Me?
Hey, are you from Class 2?
Mikie Okamine, Shido-san.
That's right. Mikie. What's up?

This is, um... Did you drop this earlier,
Shido-san?

Hm? Oh, my handkerchief. I totally didn't notice.
Thank you.

Oh, it's no problem at all. So Shido-san, do you
know where Origami-san went?

Origami? Oh, come to think of it, she said she
needed to talk with Tama-chan, so she
dropped by the teacher's lounge.
Ah. She's at Tamae ne-san's place, I see?
Did you have plans to head home with Origami?

Haaaaau! Th-That's not it, but... I was hoping
to go home with her.

Gotcha. Then why don't you drop by the
teacher's lounge?

I'll do that. Shido-san, are you waiting for
someone?
Hm? Yeah, kinda.

I heard rumors of you and Miku, the senior.
Are they true?

Uh, yeah. They are. Wait, there are rumors
going around?

Yes... A lot of them. I mean, Miku-san is
quite popular after all.
S-Seriously...? I had no idea.
So are the rumors true? Are you two d-dating?
Yes, we are.
No, we're not.
Well, I guess you could say... we are.
Fueeeee. You guys are!

Sorry, but could you keep it secret? From what
you're telling me, there are lots of rumors going
around.
Y-Yes, I promise!
Well... No, we're not really dating.
Oh, really～.
Well, kind of, but we're almost there.
But I think you two suit each other.
You think so?
Darling, sorry for the wait～.
Oh, you made it.
Apologies, darling～. I ran late.
It's totally fine. I was chatting with Mikie.
H-Hello, Miku-san.
Oh, my. Hello～.

W-Well, I'm going to the teacher's lounge
now!
Okay. Later.

Okay. Good-bye! Nice to meet you too,
Miku-san.
Farewell～.
Okay... Well, let's go home.
Hehe. Okay～.

But darling, before we do that, there's
something I wanted to talk with you about.
(Huh? What could it be about?)
Sure, I don't mind.
Okay, then we'll do it here.
(Miku's acting strange all of a sudden...)
Hey, darling...?
Wh-What is it?
?! Huh?!
Who's... that woman?
Wh-What's gotten into you?!
Just answer me... Who was that woman, darling?

Wait a minute. Who are you talking about?
That girl?

Don't play dumb. The girl you were just flirting
with.
Wait, are you talking about Mikie?
Yes, yesssss. Whatever her name may be.
I wasn't flirting with her. We were just talking.

You're lying through your teeth. Not cool,
darling. She was totally kissing up to you.
I could see her inching closer.

Oh, come on. She wasn't doing that. It's not
like I even know her that well.

Darling, you seemed to be enjoying yourself
too. Your eyes were beaming when she was
here.

I was not! Absolutely not! What's the deal,
Miku? You're letting it bother you too much.

No one can ever approach my darling. Do
you understand that?
What...? That's a bit much.
A bit much...? So she's just a classmate?
Yeah.
She's a little cute.

Yeah. She's just an acquaintance. Like I told
you, we don't know each other well. She just
happened to strike up a conversation.
Are you sure...?
Yes, I'm sure. So stop intimidating me.
Then, the handkerchief.
Excuse me?

She gave you a handkerchief, didn't she? What
does that mean?

This is a misunderstanding. It was mine. She
saw me drop it, and picked it up for me.
Then, give it to me.
Huh? Give what to you?
The handkerchief. Come on. Hurry.

Oh, come on. Who cares? I'll wash it when
I get home.

What are you talking about? That woman
touched it, and it's now dirty. I'll toss it for
you.

No, that's a waste. I can't throw it away for
something silly like that.
Nooo～.
Aah!

I'll give you mine, unless there's something more
to it?

You better not say you'd rather have hers,
would you?

W-Well, no... Calm down, Miku?! What the―?!
You're taking scary stuff out of your bag!
...Are you sure?
Positive!
Then, let me borrow it～.
O-Okay...
I'll get rid of this, okay?
Yeah... Thanks.

Oh, I'm so glad we came to an agreement, darling.
What a relief.
Man, Miku... You're overreacting.
Hey, darling...?
What could it be now?
If you ever cheat...
Whoa!!! Okay, okay! I get it, so put it away!

"Then tell me you love me～. If you can say,
"I love you," to me, then I'll forgive you for
this incident."
(F-Forgive me? I didn't do anything wrong.)
O-Okay. I'll say it, so listen up, okay?
Okay ♪
...I-I love you, Miku.
More than the whole wide world?
Yes. I love you more than anything in the world.
More than anyone...?
I-I love you more than anyone.
Hehe. Aw, darling...
I... love you, too.
O-Okay...
(Uh, so... What should I do?)
Well, she's kind of cute.
I see...
Whoa. Um, Miku-san...?
So you were hitting on her, were you?
W-Well, I didn't, but...
I guess I have no choice...
H-Hey, come on! Hear me out!

Hear you out? So you can tell me how you
were smitten? I really don't like it.
Hey, wait! Please. Just calm down!
You know, I always knew she was suspicious.

She got near my darling. Despite you being my
darling, I bet you anything she's in the shadows,
laughing. I hate her. I HATE HER! I'll kill―

WHOAAAAAAAAAAA! Miku, MIKU! Calm down!
Listen to me!

Don't worry. I'll save you from that wretched
woman...

Enough. I said she was cute, but I didn't mean
anything by it.
Move away, darling. Or else I can't kill her.
Miku!
I'll rid you of any pests who go near you...
Miku!

Darling belongs to me. You're only my darling,
right?

I didn't mean it. You're cuter, Miku! I think
you're the cutest girl in the whole world!
*pant, pant*...
Darling, did you say something just now?

Yeah, I did. I said Mikie was cute, but you're
way cuter. I said you're the cutest girl in the
whole world.

Really? You better not be trying to butter me
up.
Of course not. You're the cutest girl I know.
Am I cute?
To me, Miku, you'll always be number one.
...Hehe.
Hehehehehe.

Darling... said I'm the cutest. That he loves me
more than anyone. That he only has eyes for me.
That he'll never talk to another woman. Hehehe.
(I don't think I said that much...)

(But it calmed her down, so I'm going to leave
this conversation where it is.)
